participant_1.background:
I am a quiet, but hardworking individual who is eager to learn and contribute to your company.
i am on my way to uc santa cruz where i was accepted.
I think my pets are the best things in my life.
i do not have a job and sit on the couch all day.
I collect fantasy novels to expand my mind and escape from the real world.

participant_2.background:
I'm small, but I stand out in a crowd because I love wearing leather.
I've had to raise my kids as a single parent.
I like to eat healthy foods so that I have energy to teach my students.
I'm always looking for ways to make my home cooking more exciting, and I love trying new recipes.
i sing many songs.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
Hey! It's going well, thanks! How about you?
It's going pretty good! I'm just sitting around, watching Netflix and reading my fantasy novels.
That sounds like a relaxing day. I'm currently in the process of making dinner.
I'm making a stir fry. I love trying new recipes.
That sounds delicious! I love stir fries. I'm not much of a cook myself, but I love eating.
Well, you're in luck! I'm always looking for people to try my food.
Haha, I'd love to try some of your cooking!
Great! I'll bring you some over later.
That's so kind of you! Thanks!
No problem! I love sharing my food with others.
